channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: So Long, GPT-5. Hello, Qwen
item.description: In the AI boom, chatbots and GPTs come and go quickly. (Remember Llama?) GPT-5 had a big year, but 2026 will be all about Qwen.

item.title: In Cryptoland, Memecoin Fever Gives Way to a Stablecoin Boom
item.description: In a year that began with a memecoin trading frenzy, stablecoins have emerged as the respectable face of the crypto industry.

item.title: HelloFresh Coupon Codes: 55% Off + Free Meals
item.description: Get up to 55% off and free meal boxes using a HelloFresh coupon code today. Discover our best codes and discounts to let you save time and money.

item.title: The US Must Stop Underestimating Drone Warfare
item.description: The future of conflict is cheap, rapidly manufactured, and tough to defend against.

item.title: As people look for ways to make new friends, here are the apps promising to help
item.description: We've compiled a list of friendship apps, from friend discovery platforms like BFF to event-focused ones like Timeleft.

item.title: What’s ahead for startups and VCs in 2026? Investors weigh in
item.description: VCs share their thoughts on what next year could bring to the market.

item.title: Naware’s chemical-free weed killer tech could change how we treat lawns
item.description: A classic hardware startup, Naware set out with a problem -- kill weeds without chemicals -- and relentlessly tinkered until they found a solution.

item.title: Ricoh GR IV Review: Everyone's Favorite Pocket Camera Gets Better
item.description: Ricoh’s cult-inspiring pocketable camera gets a small update, with important improvements in autofocus and image quality.

item.title: How reality crushed Ÿnsect, the French startup that had raised over $600M for insect farming
item.description: French insect farming company Ÿnsect was recently placed into judicial liquidation for insolvency, despite raising over $600 million.

item.title: Treat yourself: The best smart glasses to buy with your holiday gift money
item.description: Whether you’re looking to get a pair yourself or just want to explore what’s available on the market today, we’ve compiled a list of the most compelli...
